name: Skyway
description: Skyway is a third person puzzle-platformer set in an abstract universe! Jump, Climb, and Dash your way through an increasingly difficult fortress in the sky! Solve the puzzles, score the fastest time, and challenge yourself to master the controls!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Any Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 64-Bit Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
